name: Lemon Garlic Grilled Chicken
directions: Marinate chicken with olive oil, garlic, lemon juice, salt, and pepper for 30 minutes.
Grill chicken over medium heat for 5-6 minutes per side until cooked through.
Sauté zucchini and bell pepper until tender.
Serve grilled chicken with vegetables and cooked rice.

name: Shrimp Stir-Fry with Quinoa
directions: Heat sesame oil in a pan over medium heat.
Sauté garlic and ginger until fragrant.
Add shrimp and cook for 2-3 minutes per side.
Add broccoli and carrots, stir-fry for 4-5 minutes.
Stir in coconut aminos and mix well.
Serve over cooked quinoa.

name: Beef and Sweet Potato Skillet
directions: Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium heat.
Cook onions until softened, then add ground beef.
Cook beef until browned, then add diced sweet potatoes.
Cover and cook for 10-12 minutes until potatoes are tender.
Stir in spinach, season with paprika, salt, and pepper.
Serve hot.

name: Spaghetti Squash with Turkey Bolognese
directions: Cut spaghetti squash in half, bake at 375°F (190°C) for 40 minutes.
Scoop out strands with a fork.
Heat olive oil in a pan, sauté onions and garlic.
Add ground turkey, cook until browned.
Stir in tomato sauce, oregano, salt, and pepper.
Simmer for 10 minutes, then serve over spaghetti squash.

name: Grilled Salmon with Roasted Vegetables
directions: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
Toss potatoes, asparagus, and tomatoes with olive oil, salt, and pepper.
Roast vegetables for 25 minutes.
Grill salmon for 4-5 minutes per side.
Serve with roasted vegetables.

name: Zucchini Noodles with Chicken
directions: Heat olive oil in a pan over medium heat.
Cook chicken until golden brown.
Add garlic and cherry tomatoes, cook for 2 minutes.
Stir in zucchini noodles and cook for another 2 minutes.
Serve hot.

name: Quinoa and Black Bean Bowl
directions: Mix all ingredients in a bowl.
Serve warm or cold.

name: Eggplant and Chickpea Curry
directions: Heat coconut oil in a pan, sauté onions.
Add eggplant and cook for 5 minutes.
Stir in chickpeas, tomatoes, and cumin.
Simmer for 15 minutes and serve over rice.

name: Stuffed Peppers with Ground Beef
directions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Heat olive oil in a pan, cook onions and beef until browned.
Stir in cooked rice and tomato sauce.
Stuff bell peppers with the mixture.
Bake for 25 minutes and serve.

name: Cabbage and Chicken Stir-Fry
directions: Heat sesame oil in a pan over medium heat.
Cook chicken until golden brown.
Add cabbage, carrots, and garlic, stir-fry for 5 minutes.
Stir in coconut aminos, cook for 2 more minutes, and serve over rice.

name: Garlic Lime Chicken with Cauliflower Rice
directions: Marinate chicken in olive oil, lime juice, garlic, salt, and pepper for 30 minutes.
Grill or pan-fry chicken for 5-6 minutes per side until cooked through.
Sauté cauliflower rice and bell peppers until tender.
Serve chicken over cauliflower rice.

name: Beef and Broccoli Stir-Fry
directions: Heat sesame oil in a pan over medium heat.
Sauté garlic and ginger until fragrant.
Add beef strips and cook for 3-4 minutes until browned.
Add broccoli and onions, stir-fry for 4-5 minutes.
Stir in coconut aminos and mix well.
Serve over cooked rice.

name: Baked Cod with Roasted Vegetables
directions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Toss potatoes, zucchini, and tomatoes with olive oil, salt, and pepper.
Place cod fillet on a baking sheet and season.
Bake for 20 minutes or until fish is flaky.
Serve with roasted vegetables.

name: Turkey and Zucchini Meatballs
directions: Mix ground turkey, zucchini, onion, garlic, salt, and pepper.
Form into meatballs and bake at 375°F (190°C) for 20 minutes.
Heat olive oil in a pan, lightly sauté the meatballs.
Serve over cooked quinoa.

name: Salmon and Avocado Bowl
directions: Season salmon with salt and pepper, then pan-fry or bake until cooked through.
Slice avocado and cucumber.
Serve salmon over cooked rice with avocado and cucumber on the side.

name: Stuffed Zucchini Boats
directions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Heat olive oil in a pan, cook onions and ground beef until browned.
Stir in tomatoes and cooked quinoa.
Stuff the mixture into zucchini halves.
Bake for 20 minutes and serve.

name: Eggplant and Tomato Stew
directions: Heat coconut oil in a pan over medium heat.
Sauté garlic and onions until soft.
Add diced eggplant and cook for 5 minutes.
Stir in tomatoes and simmer for 15 minutes.
Serve over cooked rice.

name: Grilled Chicken Salad
directions: Grill chicken until fully cooked and slice.
Mix lettuce, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, and quinoa in a bowl.
Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice.
Top with grilled chicken and serve.

name: Spicy Shrimp with Cauliflower Rice
directions: Heat sesame oil in a pan over medium heat.
Sauté shrimp with chili flakes for 2-3 minutes per side.
Add bell peppers and onions, stir-fry for 4-5 minutes.
Stir in coconut aminos and mix well.
Serve over cauliflower rice.

name: Lentil and Spinach Stew
directions: Heat olive oil in a pot over medium heat.
Sauté onions and carrots until soft.
Add lentils and vegetable broth, bring to a boil.
Simmer for 20 minutes, then stir in spinach.
Serve over cooked quinoa.

name: Sweet Potato and Black Bean Chili
directions: Heat olive oil in a pot over medium heat.
Sauté onions, garlic, and bell peppers for 3-4 minutes.
Add sweet potato, diced tomatoes, and spices.
Simmer for 20 minutes until potatoes are tender.
Stir in black beans and cook for another 5 minutes.
Serve hot.

name: Zucchini Noodles with Avocado Pesto
directions: Blend avocado, basil, garlic, olive oil, lemon juice, salt, and pepper until smooth.
Toss with spiralized zucchini noodles.
Serve immediately.

name: Chickpea and Spinach Stew
directions: Heat olive oil in a pot over medium heat.
Sauté onions and garlic for 3-4 minutes.
Add diced tomatoes, chickpeas, and spices.
Simmer for 15 minutes.
Stir in fresh spinach and cook for 2 minutes.
Serve over cooked quinoa.

name: Stuffed Bell Peppers with Lentils
directions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Sauté onion and garlic in olive oil.
Mix with lentils, quinoa, and spices.
Stuff bell peppers with the mixture.
Bake for 20 minutes and serve.

name: Mushroom and Cauliflower Stir-Fry
directions: Heat sesame oil in a pan over medium heat.
Sauté garlic, onions, and mushrooms for 5 minutes.
Add cauliflower rice and coconut aminos.
Cook for another 5 minutes and serve.

name: Butternut Squash Soup
directions: Heat olive oil in a pot over medium heat.
Sauté onions and carrots for 5 minutes.
Add butternut squash and vegetable broth.
Simmer for 20 minutes until soft.
Blend until smooth and serve.

name: Cabbage and Carrot Slaw
directions: Toss cabbage and carrots in a bowl.
Drizzle with olive oil and apple cider vinegar.
Season with salt and pepper.
Serve fresh.

name: Balsamic Roasted Brussels Sprouts
directions: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
Toss Brussels sprouts with olive oil and balsamic vinegar.
Season with salt and pepper.
Roast for 20-25 minutes and serve.

name: Carrot and Lentil Soup
directions: Heat olive oil in a pot over medium heat.
Sauté onions and carrots for 5 minutes.
Add lentils and vegetable broth.
Simmer for 20 minutes until lentils are soft.
Blend until smooth and serve.

name: Grilled Portobello Mushrooms with Quinoa
directions: Preheat grill to medium heat.
Brush Portobello mushrooms with olive oil, garlic powder, salt, and pepper.
Grill for 5 minutes per side.
Serve with cooked quinoa and fresh spinach.
